# `UserCustomAttributes` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | The globally unique identifier for the object. |
| name | `string` | No |  |
| userId | `string` | No | The user's Id which the attributes are being assigned to. |
| schema | [`DataSchema`](dataschema-definition.md) | No | The schema that dictates which attributes can be included. |
| attributes | `object` | Yes | The map of attribute values. |
| selfUri | `string` | No | The URI for this object |
